snippet.title: SturmFront - The Mutant War: Trailer [Shmup 2015]
snippet.description:
SturmFront - The Mutant War is a fast paced Arcade shooter in finest handcrafted pixelart and psychedelic music. 
You are Siegried von Hammerstein, the last active cyborg battleunit, tasked to kill all mutants!
This game is challenging and hard as hell and only the strongest will prevail.

System: PC 

Release: Summer 2015
